events.title: Private Party Events
events.subtitle: Reservation
events.description:
At Pizzeria Toplar, you can reserve a table or book the entire hayrack for a private party. We prepare food starting at 3 PM and can accommodate custom requests by agreement.
 Reservations are accepted via phone at 01-7886-833 or 041-655-227.

park.title: Park Loka
park.subtitle: Rental
park.description: Near the waterfalls of the Krka River, close to an ancient Roman road, lies the picturesque village of Zagradec. It is built upon the heritage of the old ironworks settlement Fužina. Today, a hydroelectric plant and the only roller mill in the upper Krka River basin still stand here. Stunning views of the Krka River offer a unique boutique tourism experience, which you can also explore in our Park Loka.

biljard.title: Billiards
biljard.subtitle: A game of billiards
biljard.description: Enjoy a game of billiards with friends over a cold beer. The billiards table is for adults only, with a smaller children's table available nearby.

about.text1: In 1991, we opened a bistro in a building that used to serve as a stable. Later, we expanded our offerings with pizzas and hamburgers. We upgraded the premises with a large terrace and garden, and in 2019, we extended and completely renovated the pizzeria. The interior and exterior of the pizzeria reflect our love for antiques, which give the spaces a homely touch. In this way, we strive to preserve the cultural heritage of our country. The unique feature of our pizzeria is the hayrack next to the main building, which we have adapted for parties and private gatherings.
about.text2: The hayrack, locally called 'kazuc,' with its wooden and open structure, is an unmistakable part of the Slovenian rural landscape. In Dolenjska, the so-called double hayrack or toplar is predominant. The hayrack was originally intended for drying and storing crops, but today it is primarily used for storing agricultural machinery and tools. In the past, hayracks also had a social function, which we still preserve at Pizzeria Toplar. The Toplar hayrack was renovated for parties and private gatherings, using old materials from a barn and granary.
about.text3:
Zagraška dolin'ca
 You are beautiful indeed.
 You have sunny ridges
 and small villages.

 The green Krka
 flows silently.
 Along its deep course
 it rushes into the distance.

 There stands a white church
 by the Krka River.
 Adorning the friendly
 Zagradec Valley.

 Lojze Zupančič
about.text4: A stone's throw away from the village of Zagradec lies our Park Loka by the Krka River. During hot summer days, it offers opportunities to cool off in the pleasantly chilly river on its waterfalls and in the shade of the diverse trees surrounding the park. We have enriched the park with numerous planted flowers and shrubs, and on the slope above the river, we created an impression of landscape diversity with arches and rockeries.

loka.title: Explore the park
loka.subtitle: For use and rental inquiries, call 01-7886-833 or 041-655-227

kasca.title: Kašča
kasca.text: At the entrance to Park Loka, there is the Kašča bar, which offers refreshments during summer months with an adjusted schedule.

kozolec.title: Hayrack
kozolec.text: Below the Kašča bar is an amphitheater with a hayrack, which is intended for larger parties and events, with the possibility of renting.

loka.title: Loka
loka.text:
In the lower part of Park Loka by the Krka River, there is a diverse area for parties, picnics, camping, and sports activities.
 By arrangement, you can rent the entire space with a wooden cabin for a larger group or a specific spot by the river, complete with a picnic fire pit for smaller groups and camping.
 The lower part of the park offers recreational opportunities and is also suitable for ending a paddling trip on the Krka.
